refnamediv.refpurpose: retrieve HTTP response status for request

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The ne_get_status function returns a pointer to the HTTP status object giving the result of a request (once dispatched). The object persists until the associated request is destroyed.

refsect1.title: Example
refsect1.para: Display the response status code of applying the HEAD method to some resource.
